name: COVID19SNOMEDValueSetForMyelodysplasticSyndromes
title: COVID19 SNOMED Value Set for Myelodysplastic Syndromes
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains terms related to myelodysplastic syndromes and listed as a blood disorder/hemoglobinopathy on the CDC SARS-CoV-2 hospitalization surveillance case report form.),(Data Element Scope: ),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes myelodysplastic syndromes, refractory anemia, and refractory neutropenia.),(Exclusion Criteria: )

concept.display: Myelodysplastic syndrome with single lineage dysplasia (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic syndrome with multilineage dysplasia (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic syndrome with isolated deletion 5q (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic syndrome with ring sideroblasts and single lineage dysplasia (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic syndrome with excess blasts (morphologic abnormality)
Refractory anemia with excess blasts in transformation (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic syndrome, no International Classification of Diseases for Oncology subtype (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic syndrome with excess blasts-1 (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic syndrome with excess blasts-2 (morphologic abnormality)
Refractory cytopenia with unilineage dysplasia (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic/myeloproliferative neoplasm with ring sideroblasts and thrombocytosis (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic syndrome with ring sideroblasts and multilineage dysplasia (morphologic abnormality)

contains.display: Myelodysplastic syndrome with isolated deletion 5q (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic syndrome with increased blasts (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic neoplasm with increased blasts-1 (morphologic abnormality)
Myelodysplastic neoplasm with increased blasts-2 (morphologic abnormality)
